title: Critique of Gillette's Toxic Masculinity Ad
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda talks with Humberto about the backlash against the Gillette toxic masculinity advertisement. As usual, they got into a heating argument about gender politics. They eventually made up with something involving a Beatles song.

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

Feb 1, 2019.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

Access archive at: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
